code: import api from'./api';export const authService={login:async credentials=>{const response=await api.post('/auth/login/',credentials);return response.data;},register:async userData=>{const response=await api.post('/auth/register/',userData);return response.data;},logout:async refreshToken=>{await api.post('/auth/logout/',{refresh_token:refreshToken});},getProfile:async()=>{const response=await api.get('/auth/profile/');return response.data;},updateProfile:async userData=>{const response=await api.patch('/auth/profile/',userData);return response.data;},changePassword:async passwordData=>{await api.put('/auth/change-password/',passwordData);}};
